title: [Large-Scale] EdTech Identity Exploration and Language Education Application Project

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Digital Literacy and Language Teaching Experience
context.additional_context: Learners are professionals, with an emphasis on developing practical EdTech applications linked to their work.

learning_goals: They analyze and explain the multidimensional definition of EdTech from the perspective of technology-education interaction.
They design PBL projects using non-traditional EdTech tools (metaverse/generative AI, etc.) applicable to language education.
They diagnose limitations of existing instructional design frameworks and propose alternative research methodologies.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
